oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Confederate Wiley Bartlette at Vicksburg
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sgt. Bartlette was from Claiborne Co. and served in Co. H, 61st TN Mtd. Inf. He is writing his wife Sallie from Vicksburg: "I cant tell whether we will have to fight here or not the yankeys keep threatening us here at Vicksburg but they seem to be very; slow about making the attack�I guess for they cant have any chance at us without they come in on the back of us."
